author: Carter Sharer
description:
üî•SHOP NOW!!üî•‚îÅ‚ñ∫ https://www.teamrar.com/ 

Carter Sharer just built the World's Tallest Trampoline Tower (https://youtu.be/wZ92QkMdoyE) But today Carer Share, Lizzy Capri, Ryan Prunty, Stove's Kitchen, Bailey Bagles Payne and Deniesse do an insane EAT IT AND I'll PAY FOR IT CHALLENGE: SOUR EDITION! That's right, TEAM RAR has done the Eat it and I'll Pay For It Fast Food edition, as well as Gummies, Chocolate (dark, milk and white), Fast Food (fries, burgers, chicken nuggets) and now one of the hardest challenges yet: SOUR CANDY!! From Sour Skittles and Fun Dips to Sour Punch Straws, Sour Patch Kids, Toxic Waste Warheads and Sour Pop Rocks, we ate it all!! Each category of sour food paid up to the ultimate: sour soda with a sour shot full of sour treats! This was way more sour than any of us expected. What's the most sour food you've ever eaten?? Were there any sour candies you think we should have tried? Comment below!!
